item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Frequent standing water, 19th March
item.description:
Left lane to turn into Longlevens towards Gloucester regularly floods at the traffic lights, with large amounts of deep water. Previously reported, and allegedly fixed, but made no difference. There's clearly drainage issues here because the underpass under the road also floods.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Whole road needs resurfacing., 19th March
item.description:
This road is shocking and causing damage to each and every car that goes over it. It needs to be resurfaced. I received and update as per picture saying this pot hole has been repaired. Well I have been down there numerous times today and not seen a single worker or hole repaired so no idea where. The roads that don't really need repairs are being done (Hyde lane to voxwell) and the ones that need it are being left (priors road and voxwell to Finlay way) this really needs to looked into properly instead of wasting money and time .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chiltern Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 potholes on either side of road, unavoidable. They were fixed about a year ago. About a month ago someone put white paint around them but now worn off, 19th March
item.description:
The lowest part of the road between shipton and the Bourton road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shipton, Cotswold

item.title: Multiple potholes continue to deteriorate rapidly become deeper and wider (in just the last week, one of the potholes as increased in size by 2 foot. At least one pedestrian has been seen falling over when crossing the road when they fell into one of the potholes. This was AFTER the previous report was closed as having been fixed even though no action had been taken., 19th March
item.description:
Photos are outside 269 Priors Road but potholes extend from 277 down to past the blocks of flats.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 271, Priors Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Between 20 and 1Greenhills Road there are several potholes not yet marked in white. Presume the person who marked two only had a white stick. The fix in December 2023 was inadequate. This area at the junction of Charlton Lane/Greenhills Road needs patching., 19th March
item.description:
Between entrances to 20 and 1 Greenhills Road. Wider patching required given narrow road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Greenhills Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Problem no where near fixed, 19th March
item.description:
You’ve said the issue is fixed yet you changed one paving slab. Literally next to it is broken uneven slabs and it’s the same all around whaddon

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Tamar Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham

item.title: As per previous reports water is flooding from around manhole down Farm Lane to the A46 where is flooding., 19th March
item.description:
Reported in February and reported as cleared. Same location. Here is a precise what3words address, made of 3 random words. Every 3 metre square in the world has its own unique what3words address. ///gobbles.trouble.reminds https://w3w.co/gobbles.trouble.reminds
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Farm Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Bad Planning, 19th March
item.description:
Who is the idiot who decided to do this work this week making children late for school. It's the school holidays next week, but obviously you do not care about children's education. Perhaps the person planning this work should have gone to school more often?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: Mini-roundabout needed, 19th March
item.description:
It is very difficult to exit Badgeworth Lane here, not to mention Greenway Lane. A mini-roundabout would slow down traffic entering and exiting Shurdington along the A46 too. Traffic may even slow down enough to allow people to exit the hotel safely. A bend in the A46 doesn't help here. Just generally slowing traffic down here would be good.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greenway Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Failed utilities patch, 19th March
item.description:
A utilities patch across All Saints Road, in front of no. 56 has failed and has begun to sink, creating a linear pot hole across the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 58, All Saints' Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
